last_episode_to_air.name: Episode 29
last_episode_to_air.overview: Aytolun and Goncagul walk into Ertugrul's trap. Tugtekin witnesses a scene that turns the tables on Gumustekin.

name: Resurrection: Ertugrul
overview: Ertuğrul Bey and the Knights Templar in the 13th century Alba and step and step with the struggle against brutal Mongols depicts the process of establishing the Ottoman principality.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: Winter approaches Suleyman Shah's camp. On a hunt, Ertugrul rescues prisoners from the Crusaders. Commander Titus and Ustadi Azam build a new army.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: Kara Toygar threatens the Kayi camp when Suleyman Shah refuses to turn over the prisoners. Titus learns the excruciating truth about his brother.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: In the search for a new camp, Suleyman sends Ertugrul to Aleppo and fuels fraternal jealously. Kurdogu makes a deal with Kara Toygar.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: On the way to Aleppo, a dangerous enemy crosses paths with Ertugrul. Halime and her family come under attack.

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: Fate hands Titus a golden chance for revenge, but the timing is not right. Selcan conspires with Gokce to boost their status in the family.

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.overview: A premonition saves Ertugrul's life as Titus raises the stakes against him. Ustadi Azam turns up the heat on his rivals.

episodes.name: Episode 7
episodes.overview: Suleyman's prayers are answered, but Gundodgu's life hangs by a thread. Kurdoglu puts another plan into action.

episodes.name: Episode 8
episodes.overview: A mysterious messenger puts a damper on the Kayi tribe's festivities. Suleyman presses Halime's father about his true identity.

episodes.name: Episode 9
episodes.overview: Sensing imminent danger, Sehzade Numan asks Suleyman for a favor. Suleyman shows Kara Toygar that he has the upper hand - but not for long.

episodes.name: Episode 10
episodes.overview: The prisoner exchange goes awry. At the camp, Hayde stands up to Kurdoglu, who exploits another opportunity to strike against Suleyman.

episodes.name: Episode 11
episodes.overview: Kurdoglu puts his plan in motion, but Ertugrul is one step ahead of him. Selcan tries to turn the tables in her favor.

episodes.name: Episode 12
episodes.overview: Kurdoglu intervenes on behalf of Kara Toygar. Selcan's maneuvering pays off, but Gundogdu spoils everything.

episodes.name: Episode 13
episodes.overview: On the way to Aleppo, Ertugrul and Halime walk into lion's den. Gundogdu and Kurdoglu have a heated face-off.

episodes.name: Episode 14
episodes.overview: Ustadi Azam is determined to eliminate anyone who stands in the way of his campaign. Suleyman's greatest threat is close by.

episodes.name: Episode 15
episodes.overview: Selcan tries to kill two birds with one stone, but her ambition becomes her downfall. With Halime in critical condition, Ertugrul's group splits up.

episodes.name: Episode 16
episodes.overview: Ustadi Azam uses Ibn Arabi to tighten the screws on Giovanni. An informant pulls the wool over Sahabettin's eyes.

episodes.name: Episode 17
episodes.overview: Sahabettin falls deeper into love's trap. The Knights Templar's lethal weapon strikes the Kayi tribe on the eve of their migration.

episodes.name: Episode 18
episodes.overview: Sahabettin is key to Ertugrul's plan, but El Aziz stands in the way. Turgut and Yigit are still missing, but Ertugrul has a more immediate problem.

episodes.name: Episode 19
episodes.overview: After narrowly escaping a tragic fate, Ertugrul makes a radical plan as time runs out for Sahabettin.

episodes.name: Episode 20
episodes.overview: With El Aziz unwavering in his decision, Sahabettin prepares to embrace his fate, but a hooded stranger makes a surprise showing.

episodes.name: Episode 21
episodes.overview: Izadora takes Yigit under her wing, Nasir has El Aziz wrapped around his finger and orders a thorough manhunt to finish what he started.

episodes.name: Episode 22
episodes.overview: Ertugrul cautions Numan, who puts himself in the firing line at El Aziz's palace. A visitor gives Turgut hope.

episodes.name: Episode 23
episodes.overview: Deli Demir heads for Aleppo and cannot believe what he sees upon arrival. Ertugrul puts his life on the line to set a trap for Nasir.

episodes.name: Episode 24
episodes.overview: Titus brushes up against a sworn enemy from the past. During a confrontation with Nasir, Ertugrul faces a difficult choice.

episodes.name: Episode 25
episodes.overview: Leyla helps Ertugrul at a critical moment, but her absence draws attention. Seeking answers about her family, Izadora makes a deal with Turgut.

episodes.name: Episode 26
episodes.overview: Ertugrul makes a narrow escape. Nasir has an elaborate plan for Halime, who struggles to make El Aziz see the truth.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: Aykiz takes matters into her own hands and pays Eftelya a visit. Ustadi Azam goes after a mole on his own turf.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: Gundogdu and Selcan come to blows over her ambitions. Ertugrul brings pressure to bear on Eftelya, but the tribe needs her alive.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: To infiltrate the Knights Templar's base, Ertugrul deliberately leaks information. Numan's decision deals a major blow to Halime.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: Ertugrul captures an important prisoner on the way. Ustadu Azam grooms Yigit for the final stage of his plan.

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: A message arrives at the Kayi camp, and Selcan decides it is time to settle accounts with Suleyman. Marcus falls for the Kayi tribe's ruse.

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.overview: Titus wreaks havoc on the camp. A surprise visitor knocks on Afsin's door, and Numan leaves Ertugrul no choice but to walk away from Halime.

episodes.name: Episode 7
episodes.overview: As Titu's plan spirals out of control and he and Kurdoglu look for a way out, Sahabettin watches them closely.

episodes.name: Episode 8
episodes.overview: The Knights Templar's position in Aleppo depends on Eftelya, who tries to turn Ertugrul against Halime.

episodes.name: Episode 9
episodes.overview: Eftelya decides her own fate. A showdown between Ertugrul and Titus gets interrupted, and Ertugrul questions Kara Toygar's true motives.

episodes.name: Episode 10
episodes.overview: Nasir oversteps his bounds with El Aziz, and Halime seizes her chance to appeal on behalf of the Kayi tribe.

episodes.name: Episode 11
episodes.overview: In pitting herself against Selcan, Aykiz plays with fire. Ertugrul rushes to head off the diplomatic mess Nasir created.

episodes.name: Episode 12
episodes.overview: Selcan falls out of Hayme's favor. Ertugrul walks into an important meeting and exposes a conspiracy against his tribe.

episodes.name: Episode 13
episodes.overview: El Aziz hands down a harsh sentence to Leyla and Nanny. Ertugrul and Gundogdu return home to a slew of shocking news.

episodes.name: Episode 14
episodes.overview: News about Halime sends Ertugrul back on the road. Claudius accepts a mission that puts Ibn Arabi in harm's way.

episodes.name: Episode 15
episodes.overview: Kurdoglu tries to turn Suleyman and Gundogdu against Ertugrul, who negotiates with El Aziz at knife-point.

episodes.name: Episode 16
episodes.overview: Ustadi Azam loses his grip on Aleppo. At the camp, public opinion is not in Suleyman's favor, and Hayme cracks down on Selcan.

episodes.name: Episode 17
episodes.overview: Claudiu's mission hits a snag. Hayme discovers that Selcan has a personal vendetta, but Gundogdu stands by Selcan.

episodes.name: Episode 18
episodes.overview: Gundogdu unwittingly becomes a part of Kurdoglu's scheme. Hayme gives Halime and Gokce a dilemma.

episodes.name: Episode 19
episodes.overview: Gundogdu squares off with Ertugrul. Selcan stirs the pot at the family meal, where an unexpected guest arrives with distressing news for Halime.

episodes.name: Episode 20
episodes.overview: Cardinal Thomas and Titus carry out their plan with Turgut, whose decisions spell disaster for Ertugrul.

episodes.name: Episode 21
episodes.overview: Suleyman meets with the Seijuks, but Ertugrul's return throws the camp into disarray. Halime refuses the Seijuk sultan's offer.

episodes.name: Episode 22
episodes.overview: With their greatest obstacle out of the way, Ustadi Azam and Kurdoglu advance on their target, but Gundogdu tests Kurdoglu loyalty.

episodes.name: Episode 23
episodes.overview: A visitor brings news of Turgut to the Kayi camp and puts Kurdoglu in an unfavorable position. A murder plot unravels.

episodes.name: Episode 24
episodes.overview: Kurdoglu incurs Selcan's wrath. Izadora helps Suleyman connect the dots, and Eftelya gets her hands on an important letter.

episodes.name: Episode 25
episodes.overview: Ertugrul and Suleyman put Kurdoglu on the stand, but Gundogdu steps in. Thomas tests Ustadi Azam's patience.

episodes.name: Episode 26
episodes.overview: Turgut is not out of the woods yet. Selcan pulls strings to influence Gundogdu, and Hayme loses control of the situation.

episodes.name: Episode 27
episodes.overview: Gokce overhears Selcan's secret plan, and Suleyman invites a contest for power that threatens to pit his sons against each other.

episodes.name: Episode 28
episodes.overview: Gokce sees Selcan's true colors and confronts her. Gundogdu plays into Kurdoglu's hands, but someone more powerful has a hidden plan.

episodes.name: Episode 29
episodes.overview: Selcan loses favor with Gundogdu as her ambitions get the best of her. Kurdoglu unleashes another weapon to sow chaos in the camp.

episodes.name: Episode 30
episodes.overview: While Suleyman gives him the benefit of the doubt, Kurdoglu misleads Suleyman's men. Yigit life is in enemy hands.

episodes.name: Episode 31
episodes.overview: After losing their only witness, Ertugrul and his men are back to square one on the hunt for the traitor, but Izadora gives them another lead.

episodes.name: Episode 32
episodes.overview: Kurdoglu takes advantage of Ertugrul's absence. When the Knight's Templar outnumber Ertugrul, his wit is the only thing that can save him.

episodes.name: Episode 33
episodes.overview: Kurdoglu tries to force Selcan's hand and makes Turgut his right-hand man. Ertugrul has valuable information that Ustadi Azam needs.

episodes.name: Episode 34
episodes.overview: Struggling to keep order among his subjects, Kurdoglu hands down Suleyman's sentence and sets a dangerous trap for him and Hayme.

episodes.name: Episode 35
episodes.overview: Selcan repents and decides to mend fences with those she has betrayed. Ertugrul meets an unlikely ally.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: A few years have passed since Ertugrul and his loyalists from the clan have settled right next to the Byzantine Empire. Sultan Aladdin is making Ertugrul work on secret missions. Ertugrul visits Bazaar for a top priority quest

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: The Knights Templar's plan comes apart at the seams, and Izadora pays a price. Claudius causes a rift between Thomas and Ustadi Azam.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: A confrontation between Ertugrul and Kurdoglu ends in bloodshed. With Ustadi Azam in grave condition, Thomas gains the upper hand.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: Kurdoglu judgment day arrives, but Thomas still has one advantage over the Kayi tribe. Ibn Arabi convince Selcan to change her ways.

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: Titus is determined to eradicate the Kayi tribe. Claudius brings urgent news to Ertugrul, who plans an offensive campaign into enemy territory.

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.overview: After Deli Demir and Afsin Bey find a way to infiltrate the Knights Templar, the Kayi tribe readies for battle.

episodes.name: Episode 7
episodes.overview: Ertugurl's army catches the Knights Templar of guard. In a tight spot, Titus suspects there's an informant from within.

episodes.name: Episode 8
episodes.overview: Under Titu's watch, Omer plays a risky double game. Selcan's sudden realization changes her fate.

episodes.name: Episode 9
episodes.overview: Omer pays a heavy price for his betrayal. Yigit helps to lead Erttugrul and his army on the road to victory.

episodes.name: Episode 10
episodes.overview: Turgut gets his sweet revenge. With Titus still a threat to the Kayi tribe, Ertugrul's men set out on a manhunt.

episodes.name: Episode 11
episodes.overview: Gundogdu responds unexpectedly to Selcan's big news. At the Kayi camp, danger still lingers in the shadows.

episodes.name: Episode 12
episodes.overview: Selcan atones for her crimes and risks her life for Gundogdu, who confronts a dangerous enemy from the past.

episodes.name: Episode 13
episodes.overview: Ibn Arabi leaves Ertugrul with a valuable relic. A perilous journey lies ahead for Ertugrul and Suleyman.

episodes.name: Episode 14
episodes.overview: As Ertugrul consolidates power across Anatolia, Hayme fears that an ominous premonition may come true.

episodes.name: Episode 15
episodes.overview: As the Kayi tribe struggles with its sudden loss, Hayme calls meeting to form a strategy against new threats.

episodes.name: Episode 16
episodes.overview: Ertugrul and Halime encounter new enemies, and sudden misfortune befalls the Kayi camp.

episodes.name: Episode 17
episodes.overview: Ertugrul's fate is uncertain, and the Oguz Turks swear to take revenge, but a shadowy figure watches them.

episodes.name: Episode 18
episodes.overview: Aytolun has her own ambitions. Gokce overhears Halime break the big news to Hayme.

episodes.name: Episode 19
episodes.overview: Gundogdu attempts to track down Noyan, while the Kayi tribe mourns two tragic losses.

episodes.name: Episode 20
episodes.overview: Selcan warns Gundogdu about the alliance, as Aytolun plants ideas in Tugtekin's head. Noyan turns up the heat on Ertugrul.

episodes.name: Episode 21
episodes.overview: An informant lurks among the Turks, who mobilize for a new campaign. Aytolun sets her plan in motion and inquires after Gokce.

episodes.name: Episode 22
episodes.overview: The Turks and Mongols play cat and mouse as Gundogdu and Tugtekin attempt to isolate the mole in their group.

episodes.name: Episode 23
episodes.overview: To solidify the alliance, Korkut Bey makes Hayme an offer. Aytolun learns something new about Gokce that complicates her plan.

episodes.name: Episode 24
episodes.overview: Hayme's decision threatens to pit Selcan against Aytolun. Ertugrul's disappearance leaves Noyan in a vulnerable position.

episodes.name: Episode 25
episodes.overview: Gundogdu tries to get behind Noyan's motives, but the Kayi tribe's greatest threat lies within.

episodes.name: Episode 26
episodes.overview: Tugtekin faces a new competitor and lets his ambitions get the best of him. Tensions escalate between the clans.

episodes.name: Episode 27
episodes.overview: Aytolun and Tugtekin plot a power grab, and Ertugrul's announcement leads to an important vote in the camp.

episodes.name: Episode 28
episodes.overview: The vote heightens tensions between the clans and sets Gokce against Halime, as Selcan's warnings fall on deaf ears.

episodes.name: Episode 29
episodes.overview: Tugtekin becomes fed up with Ertugrul's lingering influence on the camp. Ertugrul makes a separate plan with those still loyal to him.

episodes.name: Episode 30
episodes.overview: Noyan makes Gundogdu his next target. Kocabas's words instigate a confrontation that changes Ertugrul's place in the camp.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: Tugtekin intends to flex his muscles in front of Ertugrul, and Gokce decides to play a different game.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: Korkut Bey is haunted by his own demons in the Kayi tribe. As Ertugrul struggles to get back on his feet, mutiny lurks around the corner.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: Hamza's action leads to dire consequences for the Kayi tribe. With Abdurrahman's life on the line, Ertugrul goes after a traitor.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: Hayme helps mend fences between Ertugrul and Gundogdu. Tugtekin's tactics against Kayi subjects become harsher with the tribe.

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: When the two clans face off over Abdurrahman's sentence, Gundogdu makes Korkut Bey an offer and saves the day.

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.overview: Ertugrul plans a ruse with Deli Demir's help and is forced to leave the camp, while an enemy lurks nearby.

episodes.name: Episode 7
episodes.overview: Ertugrul experiences a close shave as Noyan's army draws dangerously close. Hayme takes matters into her own hands.

episodes.name: Episode 8
episodes.overview: Selcan tries to uncover what Aytolun is after, but Ertugrul is one step ahead and sends his team on a mission back to the camp.

episodes.name: Episode 9
episodes.overview: Noyan tests Abdurrahman's loyalties. Hayme confronts Korkut Bey about Aytolun and Tugtekin's behavior.

episodes.name: Episode 10
episodes.overview: Stunned by Hayme's announcement, Selcan tries to stop Gokce from falling into Aytolun's trap, but Gokce has not yet made up her mind.

episodes.name: Episode 11
episodes.overview: A surprise visitor traces Ertugrul to his hidden refuge. Ertokus Bey arrives at the camp with an important message for Ertugrul and the tribe.

episodes.name: Episode 12
episodes.overview: Abdurrahman talks himself out of a tragic end. Kocabas attempts to get a hold of Ertokus Bey's secret, but someone else overhears.

episodes.name: Episode 13
episodes.overview: Ertokus Cheks Korkut Bey's ambitions, but Aytolun refuses to back down. Noyan's men corner Ertugrul.

episodes.name: Episode 14
episodes.overview: Goncagul proves herself a force to be reckoned with. Gumustekin Bey's sudden arrival turns the tables and divides the camp.

episodes.name: Episode 15
episodes.overview: Hayme stands up to Gumustekin and gives the Dodurga clan an ultimatum. Gokce eavesdrops on Halime.

episodes.name: Episode 16
episodes.overview: Artuk Bey encourages Korkut Bey to take charge. Gundogdu becomes a pawn in two separate games of power.

episodes.name: Episode 17
episodes.overview: Hayme's courier carries out a risky task. After she sees a stranger accost Aytolun, Selcan digs into Aytolun's past.

episodes.name: Episode 18
episodes.overview: Selcan stands to pay dearly for what she discovers. Ertugruls battles on two fronts, and Tugtekin digs his own grave.

episodes.name: Episode 19
episodes.overview: Noyan plots to weaken the Kayi and Dodurga clans by dividing them. Aytolun and Goncagul's plan for Gundogdu begins to take shape.

episodes.name: Episode 20
episodes.overview: Unfortunate news arrives, wreaking havoc on the camp. Aytolun grows desperate to stop Korkut Bey from acting on a rash decision against the Kayi clan.

episodes.name: Episode 21
episodes.overview: An orchestrated riot concludes unexpectedly when a visitor's sudden arrival at the camp leads to bloodshed.

episodes.name: Episode 22
episodes.overview: Ertugrul brings news that may give the Kayi clan a second chance. As Hayme's condition remains uncertain, Selcan confronts Aytolun.

episodes.name: Episode 23
episodes.overview: Gumustekin stands his ground in a negotiation over Ertugrul's standing. A ruthless enemy is hot on Halime's tail.

episodes.name: Episode 24
episodes.overview: Gundogdu gives Selcan an ultimatum. In a vulnerable position, Ertugrul warns Gundogdu about another infiltrator.

episodes.name: Episode 25
episodes.overview: Gundogdu attempts to make Korkut Bey see the truth about recent treachery in the camp. Halime's pursuer catches her and Deli Demir unawares.

episodes.name: Episode 26
episodes.overview: Ertugrul's day of reckoning is imminent. Halime's life hangs by a thread, but a veiled stranger comes to her rescue.

episodes.name: Episode 27
episodes.overview: Karabek brings in a witness during Ertugrul's sentencing, and a battle of wills ensues between the two clans.

episodes.name: Episode 28
episodes.overview: Noyan's old rival makes a comeback. Gumustekin's plan becomes a pipe dream, and Aytolun decides to resort to more desperate measures.

episodes.name: Episode 29
episodes.overview: Noyan plots a new scheme against the Kayi clan. As leadership changes in the camp, Tugtekin refuses to give up on the power game.

episodes.name: Episode 30
episodes.overview: Ertugrul's grows suspicious of Noyan's true intentions toward Abdurrahman. Artuk takes Ertugrul to an important gathering.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: Gumustekin and Saadettin Kopek find a common target. Goncagul blackmails Selcan to keep her away from Gundogdu.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: Hayme warns Gundogdu about Gumustekin's potential ambitions. Selcan reaches an impasse because of Goncagul.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: Sungur Tekin requests a meeting with Ertugrul. Abdurrahman is in a precarious state, and Gundogdu sets out on a new campaign.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: Sungur Tekin warns Ertugrul about looming danger and hands him a valuable seal, but someone dangerous eavesdrops in the shadows.

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: Goncagul steps up her charm offensive. Ertugrul returns to the camp with unpleasant news for Hayme.

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.overview: Selcan searches desperately for an ally against Aytolun. Gumustekin goes after something he believes to be in Sungur Tekin's possession.

episodes.name: Episode 7
episodes.overview: Sungur Tekin warns Ertugrul about looming danger and hands him a valuable seal, but someone dangerous eavesdrops in the shadows.

episodes.name: Episode 8
episodes.overview: Noyan's spies at the camp have an escape strategy, but Gundogdu double-crosses them and defends his plan in front of Korkut Bey.

episodes.name: Episode 9
episodes.overview: Hamza's loyalties come under question. Using Selcan as his bargaining chip, Noyan presents Gundogdu with a dilemma.

episodes.name: Episode 10
episodes.overview: Gokce and Halime come to blows over Selcan. Noyan's demands give Aytolun and Goncagul an opportunity.

episodes.name: Episode 11
episodes.overview: The Kayi clan struggles to solve the mystery of the missing seal. Gundogdu reveals his game to Noyan, but not without bloodshed.

episodes.name: Episode 12
episodes.overview: Gumustekin holds on to a valuable possession and conspires with Aytolun, putting Korkut Bey's life on the line.

episodes.name: Episode 13
episodes.overview: A powerful new enemy gets wind of Ertugrul military endeavors. Goncagul's envy drives her to desperation.

episodes.name: Episode 14
episodes.overview: With Noyan's fate in enemy hands, Tangut decides to avenge himself. Halime sneaks into Aytolun's tent and risks getting caught red-handed.

episodes.name: Episode 15
episodes.overview: Halime suspects Banu Cicek is hiding a secret. In a twist of fate for Noyan, Saadettin Kopek arrives to challenge the clan's decisions.

episodes.name: Episode 16
episodes.overview: Gumustekin makes a deal with Saadettin Kopek that may imperil the Kayi clan, but he is unaware of Saadettin Kopek's hidden agenda.

episodes.name: Episode 17
episodes.overview: Defying the camp's vote, Sungur Tekin decides to seal Noyan's fate himself, and Saadettin Kopek takes on a risky gamble with Noyan.

episodes.name: Episode 18
episodes.overview: The Oguz seal falls into the wrong hands, and Hayme calls Goncagul in for questioning. Sungur Tekin's mission comes at a cost.

episodes.name: Episode 19
episodes.overview: As the Kayi clan mourns its loss, Sungur Tekin derails Saadettin Kopek's plan, and Ertugrul suspects intrigue.

episodes.name: Episode 20
episodes.overview: After a confrontation with Selcan, Banu Cicek reconsiders her loyalty to Aytolun. Ertugrul squares off with Gumustekin.

episodes.name: Episode 21
episodes.overview: Gumustekin uses Goncagul to manipulate Gundogdu, and plans to frame Banu Cicek in a scheme that may also endanger Aytolun.

episodes.name: Episode 22
episodes.overview: When the camp descends into chaos on Gokce and Tugtekin's big night, Gundogdu discovers evidence in Korkut Bey's room.

episodes.name: Episode 23
episodes.overview: Selcan puts her own life at risk by telling the truth. Banu Cicek convinces Ertugrul to scrutinize the facts behind the poisoning.

episodes.name: Episode 24
episodes.overview: Selcan puts her own life at risk by telling the truth. Banu Cicek convinces Ertugrul to scrutinize the facts behind the poisoning.

episodes.name: Episode 25
episodes.overview: Gundogdu is torn between Selcan and Goncagul. Ertugrul prepares to fight fire with fire and makes another decision that may pit him against Gundogdu.

episodes.name: Episode 26
episodes.overview: Goncagul pulls the wool over Gundogdu eyes and puts Selcan in a helpless position, but Ertugrul has a hidden plan to expose the real killers.

episodes.name: Episode 27
episodes.overview: Artuk Bey helps Ertugrul ensnare their enemies as Gumustekin and Aytolun prepare to realize their ultimate plan.

episodes.name: Episode 28
episodes.overview: After Selcan and Banu Cicek's meeting, Goncagul and Aytolun scramble to cover their tracks. Ertugrul suspects Saadettin Kopek has a hidden agenda.

episodes.name: Episode 29
episodes.overview: Aytolun and Goncagul walk into Ertugrul's trap. Tugtekin witnesses a scene that turns the tables on Gumustekin.
